mention.text: the tanker grounded on Bligh Reef
The Coast Guard radar watchman who started work 25 minutes before the grounding and 45 minutes before the Exxon Valdez radioed that it was aground
Alaska Superior Court that , at the first radioed report of the wreck
Coast Guard negligence , not the captain 's alleged drunken recklessness , that contributed to the grounding
Lawyers for the Coast Guard and the Justice Department
The skipper , Joseph Hazelwood , 43 , of Huntington , N.Y.
